CSSAbsolute-size.summary: The <absolute-size> CSS data type describes the absolute size keywords. This data type is used in the font shorthand and font-size properties.

remarks.para: The font size keywords are mapped to the deprecated HTML size attribute. See the HTML size attribute section below).
